TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISoapServerTlb

Docs.summary: Processes authenticated, encrypted SOAP components on servers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks See <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.SoapServerTlb> for the default implementation.
<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.ISoapServerTlb> is used internally by the .NET Framework. You do not need to use it directly in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddServerTlb (string progId, string classId, string interfaceId, string srcTlbPath, string rootWebServer, string baseUrl, string virtualRoot, string clientActivated, string wellKnown, string discoFile, string operation, out string assemblyName, out string typeName);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddServerTlb(string progId, string classId, string interfaceId, string srcTlbPath, string rootWebServer, string baseUrl, string virtualRoot, string clientActivated, string wellKnown, string discoFile, string operation, string assemblyName, string typeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The programmatic identifier of the class.
The class identifier (CLSID) for the type library.
The IID for the type library.
The path for the file containing the type library.
The root Web server.
The base URL that contains the virtual root.
The name of the virtual root.
if client activated; otherwise, .
if well-known; otherwise, .
if a discovery file; otherwise, .
The operation to perform. Specify either "delete" or an empty string.
When this method returns, contains the name of the assembly.
When this method returns, contains the type of the assembly.
Docs.summary: Adds the entries for a server type library to the Web.config and Default.disco files, depending on security options, and generates a proxy if necessary.
Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The SOAP utility is not available.
The call to get the system directory failed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeleteServerTlb (string progId, string classId, string interfaceId, string srcTlbPath, string rootWebServer, string baseUrl, string virtualRoot, string operation, string assemblyName, string typeName);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeleteServerTlb(string progId, string classId, string interfaceId, string srcTlbPath, string rootWebServer, string baseUrl, string virtualRoot, string operation, string assemblyName, string typeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The programmatic identifier of the class.
The class identifier (CLSID) for the type library.
The IID for the type library.
The path for the file containing the type library.
The root Web server.
The base URL that contains the virtual root.
The name of the virtual root.
Not used. Specify for this parameter.
The name of the assembly.
The type of the assembly.
Docs.summary: Removes entries for a server type library from the Web.config and Default.disco files, depending on security options.
Docs.exception: A caller in the call chain does not have permission to access unmanaged code.
The SOAP utility is not available.
